meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Laura Suzuki Andrew Schwerin Paula Menasche Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6512.

td.p: Laura Suzuki, a graphic designer from Toronto, Canada
Andrew Schwerin, a law student from Cherry Hill, New Jersey
Paula Menasche, a high school social studies teacher from Coral Gables, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,700)

tr.td: NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS
WHICH TIME ZONE?
AFRICAN-AMERICAN WOMEN
THAT 20-AUGHTS SHOW
NOTES FROM THE CAMPAIGN TRAIL
KINDLY CORRECT NIGEL'S SPELLING
(Alex: Each clue will have one word with the British spelling of that word; you have to correct the spelling for us.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'I\'ll adopt a rescue dog instead of last year\'s error, taking in this University of Michigan mascot')

Central Park')
